snippet: Hopes of a democratic future are shaken after the murder of an outspoken critic of the governing party.
abstract: Editorial charges murder of human-rights activist Chokri Belaid in Tunisia undermines country's progress toward democracy and pluralism; calls on Tunisia's political leadership to renew their commitment to tolerance and nonviolence.
lead_paragraph: Hopes of a democratic future are shaken after the murder of an outspoken critic of the governing party.

headline.seo: The Assassination of Chokri Belaid in Tunisia
